content:
Claim approvers, claim handlers, and claim adjusters are assigned a maximum limit for authorizing claim payments. If the claim amount exceeds this limit, it requires approval by a claim manager before payment.

Navigate to the Financials tab of the claim record and create a new loss item or expense item. Select coverages and enter details. The adjusted amount is automatically calculated by the workflow.

To pay an item, click Pay on the loss item or select items and choose Pay from the drop-down. Any excess amount exceeds user authority is sent for approval, changing the status to Pending Authority. The approver receives an email with a link to approve, deny, or reassign the request.

After approval, the status changes to Authority Approved. Click Pay to finalize payment.

The claim recovery workflow runs using the claim coverage Integration Procedure in OmniStudio.
title: Authorize Payment for Auto Claims
